problem.markdown:
>>What are measures in Excel?<<
( ) A standard of measurement across columns. (x) A calculation that you create for the purpose of measuring an outcome or result relative to other factors. ( ) A hard-coded value in the Excel data model. ( ) A way to dynamically change Excel data sources.
[explanation] Measures in Excel is a calculation created for the purpose of measuring an outcome or result relative to other factors. [explanation]

choicegroup.label: What are measures in Excel?
choicegroup.choice: A standard of measurement across columns.
A calculation that you create for the purpose of measuring an outcome or result relative to other factors.
A hard-coded value in the Excel data model.
A way to dynamically change Excel data sources.

div.p: Measures in Excel is a calculation created for the purpose of measuring an outcome or result relative to other factors.
